title: It’s Important to Watch Closely
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Honoka-senpaai, how about something like this?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Let me see.... Waaah! You drew so many hearts on it, so cute!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Well, it is a poster for an event Kasumin will be on after all, so it has to be super cute!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>What does your poster look like, Honoka-senpai?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ufufu, tadaaa! Look at it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>? These drawings are....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ehehe, they’re face portraits of everyone from μ’s, Aqours, and Nijigaku! I think I did a great job drawing them, what do you think?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>You’re pretty good at drawing, huh, Honoka-senpai. You managed to capture everyone’s characteristics quite well.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Really? I’m so happy! Maybe it’s because I’m always watching everyone~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Then, as thanks for complimenting me, I’ll draw a heart next to your portrait to make it even cuter, Kasumi-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
